attributes.action: bring in external (non Jersey) investigators, prosecutors and judiciary to address child abuse crimes in Jersey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is an urgent requirement to ensure that the terrible child abuse crimes currently being brought to light in Jersey are investigated and prosecutions brought without any possibility of interference. To ensure that a full and transparent process is completed, external (non Jersey) investigators, prosecutors and judiciary must be brought in to address and prosecute child abuse crimes in Jersey.
